text: (Aey Nabi), Insey kaho “main tumhein bas ek baat ki naseehat karta hoon, khuda ke liye tum akele akele aur do do mil kar apna dimaag ladaoo aur socho, tumhare saahib[companion(Muhammad)] mein aakhir aisi kaunsi baat hai jo junoon(madness) ki ho? Woh to ek sakht azaab ki aamad (aaney) se pehle tumko mutanabbeh karne wala hai”
